00035 #ifndef __HTTPD_H__
00036 #define __HTTPD_H__
00037 
00038 #include "psock.h"
00039 #include "httpd-fs.h"
00040 #include "uip-conf.h"
00041 #include "../mult/api_services.h"
00042 
00043 struct httpd_state {
00044   unsigned char timer;
00045   struct psock sin, sout;
00046   struct pt outputpt, scriptpt;
00047   char inputbuf[50];
00048   char filename[20];
00049   char state;
00050   struct httpd_fs_file file;
00051   int len;
00052   char *scriptptr;
00053   int scriptlen;
00054   unsigned short count;
00055 };
00056 
00057 void httpd_init(void);
00058 void httpd_appcall(void);
00059 
00060 void httpd_log(char *msg);
00061 void httpd_log_file(u16_t *requester, char *file);
